structure.unit: STATE AND FEDERAL HIGHWAYS -- LIMITED ACCESS FACILITIES -- TURNPIKES -- ROAD BONDS -- BILLBOARDS -- RECYCLERS

law.catch_line: Commissioner required to apply to Federal Highway Administration for experimental usage of signs.
law.text: Pursuant to the requirements of the MUTCD Section 1A-6, the commissioner of the Department of Highways shall apply to the Federal Highway Administration, by no later than February 1, 1999, for permission to experiment with a new usage of post-interchange guide signs on all fully controlled access highways in the Commonwealth of Kentucky.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 526, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1998.
